00036 if (isset($_POST['addrulenumber']) && ($_POST['addrulenumber'] != "")) {
00037     $_SESSION['pfw']->macro->addRule($_POST['addrulenumber']);
00038     header ("Location: macroedit.php?rulenumber=". $_POST['addrulenumber']);
00039 }
00040 
00041 if (isset($_POST['comment']) && ($_POST['comment'] == 'add')) {
00042     $_SESSION['pfw']->macro->addRule($_POST['addcomment']);
00043     header ("Location: commentedit.php?action=macro&rulenumber=". $_POST['addcomment']);
00044 }
00045 
00046 if (isset($_GET['up'])) {
00047     $_SESSION['pfw']->macro->up($_GET['up']);
00048     reload();
00049 }
00050 
00051 if (isset($_GET['down'])) {
00052     $_SESSION['pfw']->macro->down($_GET['down']);
00053     reload();
00054 }
00055

00057     $_SESSION['pfw']->macro->del($_GET['del']);
00058     reload();

00061 $active = "macro";
00062 page_header("Macro Definitions");
00063 ?>
00064 <div id="main">
00065 <h2>Macro Definitions</h2>
00066 <table>

00073 <?php
00074 $rulenumber = '0';
00075 foreach ($_SESSION['pfw']->macro->rules as $rule) {
00076     if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00077         print "<tr>\n\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00078         print "\t<td class=\"comment\" colspan=\"";
00079         print ('3'). "\">". nl2br(stripslashes($rule['comment'])). "</td>\n";
00080     } else {
00081         if ($rulenumber%2) {
00082             print "<tr class=\"even\">\n";
00083         } else {
00084             print "<tr>\n";
00085         }
00086         print "\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00087 
00088         print "\t<td>". $rule['identifier']. "</td>\n";
00089         
00090         print "\t<td>";
00091         if (is_array($rule['value'])) {
00092             foreach ($rule['value'] as $value) {
00093                 print $value. "<br />";
00094             }
00095         } else {
00096             print $rule['value'];
00097         }
00098         print "</td>\n";
00099         
00100         print "\t<td class=\"rulecomment\">". stripslashes($rule['comment']). "</td>\n";
00101     }
00102     print "\t<td class=\"edit\">\n";
00103     if ($rule['type'] != 'comment') {
00104         print "\t\t<a href=\"macroedit.php?rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> \n";
00105     } else {
00106         print "\t\t<a href=\"commentedit.php?action=macro&amp;rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> \n";
00107     }
00108     if ($rulenumber) {
00109         print "\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?up=$rulenumber\">u</a> \n";
00110     } else {
00111         print "\t\tu \n";
00112     }
00113     if ($rulenumber != (count($_SESSION['pfw']->macro->rules) - 1)) {
00114         print "\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?down=$rulenumber\">d</a> \n";
00115     } else {
00116         print "\t\td \n";
00117     }
00118     print "\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?del=$rulenumber\" title=\"Delete Rule\" onclick=\"return confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Rule?')\">x</a> \n";
00119     print "\t</td>\n";
00120 
00121     print "</tr>\n";
00122     $rulenumber++;
00123 }
00124 ?>
00125 </table>
00126     <fieldset>

00128             <div id="addrulesform">
00129                 <label for="addrulenumber">add new rule as rule number:</label>
